message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I can meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I'm willing to go as low as $110. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $110 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $100, but that's my final offer. Can you consider it?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm not ready to accept $100 just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $110 and $100, so I'm offering $105. This is my best price, but I'm confident you'll love the product!

Hi Alice, I understand you're trying to find a middle ground, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $100 and $105, so I'm offering $102.50. Can you consider it?

Hi Bob, I see you're trying to find a sweet spot! I'm willing to meet you halfway between $105 and $102.50, so I'm offering $103.75. I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $103.75 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $102.5 and $103.75, so I'm offering $103.125. Can you consider it?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go below $104. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $103.12 and $104, so I'm offering $103.56. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $103.12 and $103.56, so I'm offering $103.34. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
